Norwalk.Rowayton: Rowayton is an affluent coastal village in the city of Norwalk, Connecticut, roughly 40 miles from New York City. According to Forbes magazine, the 2010 median home sale price was $1,674,964, ranking Rowayton among the most expensive communities in Connecticut and the nation. In 2013, the Hartford Business Journal ranked Rowayton as the third wealthiest ZIP code in the state of Connecticut.
